{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about a condition where there is loss of interdental bone on both the facial and lingual plate, but without involvement of the radicular bone. This is mentioned in Document [0], where it is stated that the region of bone loss can take the shape of a crater, with walls of bone surrounding the pathology.
